sentences.english: Social and Economic Benefits Forecast Center of National Key Forestry Ecology Project.
sentences.chinese: 國家林業重點生態工程社會經濟效益測報中心。

sentences.english: It is also applicable to predict the stored-grain insects and the like.
sentences.chinese: 同時也適用於儲糧蟲害的測報等其他方面的預測。

sentences.english: The use of yellow template trapping in the fields is an important measure in the forecast and control of vegetable leaf miner.
sentences.chinese: 設置黃板誘集成蟲是斑潛蠅測報和防治的重要手段。
